Articles.Content:
So, a quick search in this forum tells me that a new user's first 3 posts will always require moderator approval. 

I've posted a bunch of times, but my posts count is still 0. Is this expected?
Looking at your post history it appears that you've posted only in the prerelease section. Posts made in this section do not count towards post count.
Go figure. That must be a pain for approving the last 24 posts...
I'm not a moderator, but posts in the Forum Games section also do not count towards your post count.
Good to know, thanks. Anywhere else? Not that it's really that important anymore (if this is approved)

The Lounge, maybe, but I don't really think so.

Edited October 5, 2016 by Dman979
